title: Learn C Programming
author: Tutorials Points
about:
C is a general-purpose, procedural, imperative computer programming language
developed in 1972 by Dennis M. Ritchie at the Bell Telephone Laboratories to
develop the UNIX operating system.

title: Python Programming
author: Adam Stewart
about:
Getting started in coding can be tough. You may have looked at a few of the
most popular coding languages, such as C++ or Java and been a bit scared by
what you saw

title: Gifted Hand
author: Ben Carson
about:
This book
is dedicated to my mother,
SONYA CARSON,
who basically sacrificed her life
to make certain that my brother and I
got a head start.

title: Smart Thinking
author: Mathew Allen
about:
The study and teaching of critical thinking (also known as informal logic) is
relatively rare in Australia. There is little to guide the keen student or teacher in the
development of skills for analysis and reasoning in everyday work and study
